participant_1.background:
I love eating McDonald's french fries, but I never tell my parents because they think they are unhealthy.
i make my own compost.
My family is supportive of my art career and helps me out when I need it.
I enjoy the sweet taste of mangoes.
I never knew my father, but my mother is always there for me.

participant_2.background:
I once dressed up as a superhero and told the police officer that I was on my way to save the world.
I am a legal assistant who loves to bake and cook in my country home.
I lost everything when the economy crashed.
I am grateful for my parents' support and encouragement.
i like to play soccer.

content.text: What kind of hobbies do you have?
I like to bake and cook in my country home.
That sounds fun! I love to bake too. I also love to play soccer.
Oh, I used to play soccer in high school. I was a really good goalie.
Really? That's awesome! I'm not very good at it, but I enjoy playing.
It's never too late to get better. Maybe we can play together sometime.
That would be really fun! I'm free this weekend, if you are.
I'm free Saturday morning. I could come over to your place and we can bake something together and then play soccer.
That sounds like a great plan! I'll send you my address.
Sounds great! I'll see you Saturday.
